com.google.code.gtkjfilechooser

Class GtkVersion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.code.gtkjfilechooser.GtkVersion

  • public class GtkVersion
extends java.lang.Object

    Version Information for GTK+

    We get the GTK version from the shared library file, for example "libgtk-x11-2.0.so.0.600.7" is GTK+ 2.6.7, "libgtk-x11-2.0.so.0.1600.1" is GTK+ 2.16.1 an so on...

    Author:
    Costantino Cerbo
    See Also:
    http ://library.gnome.org/devel/gtk/unstable/gtk-Feature-Test-Macros.html}, http://git.gnome.org/cgit/gtk+/tree/gtk/gtkversion.h.in}

    • Method Detail

      • check

        public static boolean check(int major,
            int minor,
            int micro)
        Checks that the GTK+ library in use is compatible (the same or newer) with the given version.
        Parameters:
        required_major -
        required_minor -
        required_micro -
        Returns:
        null if the GTK+ library is compatible with the given version, or a string describing the version mismatch. The returned string is owned by GTK+ and should not be modified or freed.

      • getCurrent

                 throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
